title: Ebey's Landing National Historical Reserve: Current Conditions
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Current Conditions             Alerts & Conditions         Alerts    Information        Prairie Restoration at the Prairie Overlook  Alert 1 , Severity ,information ,, Prairie Restoration at the Prairie Overlook  National Park Service and the Pacific Rim Institute are restoring the 2.5 acres of historic farmland around the Prairie Overlook to a native prairie habitat. Work will include a combination of herbicides and tilling to control invasive species.
